content.rendered:
Rugby World Cup 2023 France Complete Matchup Schedule. And this year Rugby world championship starts on Friday, September 8, 2023 – Saturday, October 28, 2023.

Download Match Schedule PDF

Rugby World Cup 2023 Matches
Dates: Matches: Locations:
September 9 France vs New Zealand Stade de France
September 9 Italy vs Namibia Stade Geoffroy-Guichard
September 9 Ireland vs Romania Stade de Bordeaux
September 9 Australia vs Georgia Stade de France
September 10 England vs Argentina Stade de Marseille
September 10 Japan vs Chile Stadium de Toulouse
September 10 South Africa vs Scotland Stade de Marseille
September 11 Wales vs Fiji Stade de Bordeaux
September 15 France vs Uruguay Stade Pierre-Mauroy
September 16 New Zealand vs Namibia Stadium de Toulouse
September 16 Samoa vs Chile Stade de Bordeaux
September 16 Wales vs Portugal Stade de Nice
September 17 Ireland vs Tonga Stade de la Beaujoire

September 18 England vs Japan Stade de Nice
September 20 Italy vs Uruguay Stade de Nice
September 22 France vs Namibia Stade de Marseille
September 22 Argentina vs Samoa Stade Geoffroy-Guichard
September 23 Georgia vs Portugal Stadium de Toulouse
September 23 England vs Chile Stade Pierre-Mauroy
September 24 South Africa vs Ireland Stade de France
September 24 Scotland vs Tonga Stade de Nice
September 25 Wales vs Australia OL Stadium
September 27 Uruguay vs Namibia OL Stadium
September 29 Japan vs Samoa Stadium de Toulouse
September 30 New Zealand vs Italy OL Stadium
September 30 Argentina vs Chile Stade de la Beaujoire
September 30 Fiji vs Georgia Stade de Bordeaux
October 1 Scotland vs Romania Stade Pierre-Mauroy
October 1 Australia vs Portugal Stade Geoffroy-Guichard
October 2 South Africa vs Tonga Stade de Marseille
October 6 New Zealand vs Uruguay OL Stadium
October 7 France vs Italy OL Stadium
October 7 Wales vs Georgia Stade de la Beaujoire
October 7 England vs Samoa Stade Pierre-Mauroy
October 8 Ireland vs Scotland Stade de France
October 8 Japan vs Argentina Stade de la Beaujoire
October 8 Tonga vs Romania Stade Pierre-Mauroy
October 9 Fiji vs Portugal Stadium de Toulouse
October 14 Winner Pool C v Runner-up Pool D Stade de Marseille
October 15 Winner Pool B v Runner-up Pool A Stade de France
October 15 Winner Pool D v Runner-up Pool C Stade de Marseille
October 16 Winner Pool A v Runner-up Pool B Stade de France
October 21 Winner Quarter-Final 1 v Winner Quarter-Final 2 Stade de France
October 22 Winner Quarter-Final 3 v Winner Quarter-Final 4 Stade de France
October 28 Runner-Up Semi-Final 1 v Runner-Up Semi-Final 2 Stade de France
October 29 Winner Semi-Final 1 v Winner Semi-Final 2 Stade de France
